rules_text: When The Skeleton Keys enters, choose target creature card in your graveyard. Return that card to the battlefield if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Return up to one creature card of each color from your graveyard to your hand.
